markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Set (Lord of the Dark Desert)](/Deities.aspx?ID=242)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 133</row>

Set is the most reviled of all the Ancient Osirian pantheon. He is the encroaching desert, the invader, the sandstorm destroying everything in its path, as well as the dead who rise from their graves.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Bring chaos to society, murder those who stand in your way, defeat your foes with personal strength and cunning

**Anathema** Refuse to fight your own battles, destroy a soul instead of turning it to undeath

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=44), [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=47)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Penumbral Shroud](/Spells.aspx?ID=582)

- **3rd**
[Cup of Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=572)

- **6th**
[Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)

</column>
name: Set (Lord of the Dark Desert)
